// @flow import React from 'react'; import { Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; // components import PageTitle from '../../components/PageTitle'; const EmbedVideo = (): React$Element => { return ( <>

Responsive embed video 21:9

Use class .ratio-21x9

{/* 21:9 aspect ratio */}

Responsive embed video 1:1

Use class .ratio-1x1

{/* 1:1 aspect ratio */}

Responsive embed video 16:9

Use class .ratio-16x9

{/* 16:9 aspect ratio */}

Responsive embed video 4:3

Use class .ratio-4x3

{/* 4:3 aspect ratio */}
); }; export default EmbedVideo;
